hero.defaultDescription: Support local-led projects and follow clear updates that show where your help goes.
hero.visualCaption: Projects and stories that show how support reaches people.

about.heroDescription: We are a newly established foundation with a bold vision. We are a movement of dedicated professionals, partners, and volunteers committed to engineering long-term solutions for Malaysia's most pressing social challenges.

q1.title: The Foundation
q1.description: Officially established Yayasan Insan Prihatin to address systemic community needs.

q2.title: First Initiative
q2.description: Launched our pilot education support program for underprivileged students.

q3.title: Community Outreach
q3.description: Expanded operations to include healthcare access in rural areas.

q4.title: Looking Ahead
q4.description: Planning nationwide expansion of our digital literacy programs.

leadership.title: Leadership & Governance
leadership.subtitle: The Stewards
leadership.description: Guided by principles of integrity and excellence, our leadership ensures every resource is maximized for community benefit.

reports.title: Accountability in Action
reports.subtitle: Radical Transparency
reports.description: Trust is our most valuable currency. We commit to publishing annual audits and impact reports to ensure every stakeholder knows exactly how their contributions are transforming lives.

cta.title: Ready to Make a Difference?
cta.description: Join us in our mission to create lasting positive change for communities across Malaysia.

projects.heroDescription: Discover our initiatives making a real difference in communities across Malaysia.

blog.heroDescription: Voices from the ground, updates on our progress, and stories of the growing impact we are building together. This is where our journey finds its narrative.
blog.author: Yayasan Team
blog.noPostsDescription: We're working on great content. Check back soon!

newsletter.description: Get exclusive updates on our projects, inspiring stories from the field, and invitations to upcoming events.
newsletter.disclaimer: We respect your inbox. Zero spam, just impact. Unsubscribe anytime.

contact.heroDescription: Have questions about our programs? Want to partner with us? Our team is here to help you make a difference.

form.title: Let's Start a Conversation
form.description: Fill out the form below and our team will get back to you within 24-48 business hours.
form.name: Your Name
form.messagePlaceholder: Tell us how we can help you...

success.title: Message Sent Successfully!
success.description: Thank you for reaching out. Our team will review your message and respond soon.

form.error: Failed to send message. Please try again.

social.title: Connect With Us
social.description: Follow us on social media for the latest updates, stories, and ways to get involved.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.description: Find quick answers to common questions about our foundation and programs

donate.q: How can I donate to Yayasan Insan Prihatin?
donate.a: You can donate through our website, bank transfer, or by visiting our office. We accept various payment methods for your convenience.

volunteer.q: Can I volunteer with your organization?
volunteer.a: Yes! We welcome volunteers for various programs including education, community outreach, and events. Please fill out the contact form above with 'Volunteering' as the subject, and our volunteer coordinator will reach out.

assistance.q: How do I apply for assistance from your programs?
assistance.a: Please contact us with details about your situation. Our team will guide you through the application process and determine which programs you may be eligible for.

corporate.a: Absolutely! We actively seek partnerships with corporations for CSR initiatives. We offer various partnership tiers and can customize programs to align with your corporate values.

taxDeductible.a: Yayasan Insan Prihatin is a registered charitable foundation. While we are currently in the process of obtaining tax-exemption status under Section 44(6) of the Income Tax Act 1967, this approval is expected soon. Once approved, all donations will be tax-deductible and we will provide official receipts for tax purposes.

donate.heroDescription: 100% of your donation goes directly to verified programs. Choose a project or support our general fund.

selectProject.title: Where would you like your donation to go?
selectProject.description: Select a specific project or contribute to our General Fund for maximum flexibility.

generalFund.title: General Fund
generalFund.description: Support our most urgent needs with maximum flexibility. We allocate funds where they're needed most.

form.title: Complete Your Donation
form.name: Full Name
form.emailNote: We'll send your tax receipt to this email
form.receiptEmail: We'll send your tax receipt to this email (your identity remains private)
form.anonymousDescription: Your name won't appear publicly, but we still need your email for the receipt

paymentCancelled.title: Payment was cancelled
paymentCancelled.description: No worries! You can try again whenever you're ready.

confirm.paymentCancelled: Payment was cancelled. You can try again.
confirm.name: Name

trust.secureDescription: Your payment is protected with bank-level 256-bit SSL encryption.

trust.taxDescription: Receive an official receipt for tax deduction purposes.

transparency.title: Where Your Money Goes
transparency.auditNote: *Audited annually by Deloitte. 2025 Transparency Report available.

success.title: Thank You for Your Generosity!

taxNotice.title: Tax Deduction Notice
taxNotice.description: Yayasan Insan Prihatin is a registered charitable organization. Your donation may be eligible for tax deduction under Section 44(6) of the Income Tax Act 1967. Please keep this receipt for your records.

emailReceipt.title: Email Receipt
emailReceipt.description: Get your official receipt sent to

share.title: Help spread kindness

failed.title: Donation Failed
failed.description: We're sorry, but your donation could not be processed. Please try again.

notFound.title: Donation Not Found
notFound.description: We couldn't find a donation with that reference. Please check your email for confirmation or contact us for assistance.

footer.tagline: Empowering communities through compassion and sustainable development.

cta.title: Ready to Make a Difference?
cta.description: Join our community of changemakers and help create lasting impact for those who need it most.

solution.title: Our Approach
solution.subtitle: Community-Led Solutions
solution.description: We partner with local leaders, design practical programs, and publish clear updates so supporters can follow real progress.
solution.defaultMission: Strengthen communities through practical support, education access, and long-term development.
solution.impactStatementDescription: We publish progress updates so supporters can track the work.
solution.projectsEmptyDescription: New initiatives are being prepared. Check back soon for published projects.

clarity.title: See where help goes
clarity.description: Updates connect your support to real outcomes.

community.title: Led by local partners
community.description: Programs reflect the needs voiced by residents.

continuity.title: Relief to resilience
continuity.description: Immediate aid is paired with lasting solutions.

storytelling.title: Stories you can follow
storytelling.description: Blog and project posts keep you informed.

homeAbout.label: About Us
homeAbout.title: Caring for Humanity, One Life at a Time
homeAbout.content: Founded with a vision to bridge the gap between privilege and need, Yayasan Insan Prihatin has grown into one of Malaysia's most trusted foundations. We believe that every individual deserves access to education, healthcare, and opportunities for growth.
homeAbout.mission: To empower underprivileged communities through sustainable programs in education, healthcare, and economic development.
homeAbout.vision: A Malaysia where every individual has equal opportunities to thrive and contribute to society.
homeAbout.impactDescription: Distributed across education, healthcare, and community programs.

compassion.title: Compassion
compassion.description: We lead with empathy, understanding the struggles of those we serve.

integrity.title: Integrity
integrity.description: Transparency and accountability in every action we take.

community.title: Community
community.description: Building stronger bonds between people and organizations.

impact.title: Impact
impact.description: Creating measurable, lasting change in every initiative.

homeCta.title: Ready to Follow the Work?
homeCta.description: Explore projects, read updates, and support the programs that matter to you.
homeCta.donationDescription: Your contribution helps active community initiatives.

metadata.siteDescription: A prestigious Malaysian foundation dedicated to community service, education, and sustainable development.
metadata.keywords: charity, foundation, Malaysia, community service, education, sustainable development

problem.title: Needs Grow Faster Than
problem.description: Rising costs and uneven access leave families choosing between essentials. When help arrives late, short-term crises become long-term setbacks.
problem.urgencyDescription: Early support prevents larger, longer struggles.

systemic.title: Limited Access
systemic.description: Essential services can be out of reach without guidance.

health.title: Health Gaps
health.description: Small issues escalate without timely care.

howItWorks.title: How Support Becomes Change
howItWorks.description: A simple, transparent path from community needs to measurable progress.

identify.title: Listen
identify.description: We meet local leaders to understand urgent needs.

mobilize.title: Act
mobilize.description: Teams and resources move quickly to where help is needed.

transform.title: Build
transform.description: Short-term relief grows into lasting community programs.

projectsPage.heroDescription: We don't just provide aid; we build systems. From infrastructure to education, every project is designed for long-term community resilience and measurable outcomes.

initiatives.title: Our
initiatives.description: Filter by category to see how we are addressing specific challenges across the nation.

noProjects.description: We're working on exciting new projects. Check back soon!

cta.title: Scale Our Impact
cta.description: We have the roadmap, but we need fuel. Your contribution accelerates essential projects in communities that cannot wait.

methodology.title: Built for

assessment.title: Needs Assessment
assessment.description: We work directly with local leaders to identify the most urgent gaps in education and infrastructure.

planning.title: Strategic Planning
planning.description: Our experts design sustainable solutions that use local resources and empower community ownership.

impact.title: Sustainable Impact
impact.description: We don't just build; we train, monitor, and ensure long-term success before handing over.
